name: UpdateStatusPagePostmortem
description:
Update a postmortem for a specific post by ID.

This tool updates a postmortem for a given post on a status page using the post ID. It requires the 'status_pages.write' scope for OAuth authorization.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the resource to be updated.

parameters.name: status_page_post_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Status Page Post to be updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Status Page Post.

parameters.name: versioning_header
parameters.description: Set the version of the API to use for the request. It is required for versioning purposes.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: postmortem_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the postmortem details to update, including type, post ID, message, and notification option.

type.description: The type of the object returned by the API - in this case, a Status Page Post Postmortem.
A string that determines the schema of the object.

message.description: The message of the Postmortem (supports Rich-Text).

notify_subscribers.description: Whether or not subscribers of the Status Page should be notified about the Postmortem.

postmortem.description: Request to create/update a given Postmortem resource.
